description: Extension to add support for vscode and npm tasks.
displayName: Task support for VS Code Explorer
config.taskExplorer.exclude: Configure glob patterns for folders that should be excluded from automatic script detection.
config.taskExplorer.includeAnt: Configure glob patterns for locating ant files not named b(B)uild.xml.
config.taskExplorer.pathToAnt: The path to the ant binary, if not registered in system path
config.taskExplorer.enableAnsiconForAnt: Enable ansicon output colorization for ant tasks.
config.taskExplorer.enableSideBar: Enable a task explorer view in the sidebar.
config.taskExplorer.enableExplorerView: Enable a task explorer tray in the Explorer sidebar view.
config.taskExplorer.pathToAnsicon: The path to the ansicon binary, if not registered in system path
taskExplorer.parseError: Task Explorer task detection: failed to parse the file {0}
taskdef.ant.fileName: The ant file that target was found in. Can be omitted.
taskdef.ant.path: The path to the folder of the xml file that provides the script. Can be omitted.
view.name: Task Explorer
